notesStmt.note: Abraham (Joseph Solomon ben Mordecai) Graziano of Modena ("Ish Ger"), (d. 1684), Italian rabbi: inscribed, folio 1r, 2r.Illegible inscriptions of former owners, folio 1r. Camillo Jaghel: inscribed with his name, 1613 (folio 133v, 342v); see 50-56. Renato da Modena: inscribed with his name, 1626 (folio 346v); see 132-133.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi and Italian semi-cursive scripts of the latter part of the 15th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Ivory leather. Spine: 'Joseph Zark. Rab Pe'alim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 75.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Samuel Schönblum of Vienna: purchsed from him by the British Museum on 22 April 1868: inscribed, folio [347v] (fse001v).
